units-help: Explanation of category vs unit behavior
category: "the category of units" part of "assuming the category of units is x" - goes into parameter 0 of `assumption`
assumptions: {1} - the converted value; {0} - list of assumptions made
assumption: A single assumption: {0} is the user string while {1} is the fuzzy-matched string
same-unit: Error message for when specified units are the same
nothing: Substituted into parameter 0 of `assumptions` when no assumptions are made
category-list: Description of list of unit categories
unit-list: Description of list of category units
fuzzy-list: Description of list of category units when the category name is fuzzily matched
aka: Surrounds the comma-separated list of unit aliases
no-aka: Replaces the list of unit aliases when there are no aliases
